scenes.text:
Are you interested in learning ballroom, Latin, or salsa dancing? The Cardiff University Dancesport Club is the only society at Cardiff University offering lessons in all three styles for all abilities! Whether you're a complete beginner or an advanced dancer, we have something for you.

Our club is dedicated to creating a friendly and supportive atmosphere where every dancer can feel comfortable and welcome. We offer high-quality lessons led by our excellent coaches, including Sean Perry, Ella Perry, and Gustav Skovbon for Ballroom and Latin, and Andy Witt for Salsa. Our competitive team is highly successful, competing across the UK university circuit, and we welcome dancers of all levels to join in competitions.

Our classes are held regularly throughout the week on Thursdays, Saturdays and Mondays for different types of dance. For full information visit our webpage. 
Classes are divided into Beginner, Novice, and Open Step levels, with Open Step covering all levels from pre-intermediate and above. We also offer practice spaces for additional training.

We offer several membership options to suit different interests and levels of commitment:

Full Year Membership: £40.00
Social Membership: £15.00
Offbeat Membership: £5.00

These memberships provide access to our lessons, practice spaces, and social events.

Our club isn't just about dancing; we also have a vibrant social scene. Follow us on Facebook and Instagram (@cudancesport) for updates on classes, competitions, photos, and social events. Every year, we proudly fundraise for a charity of our choice.
